Class AtomicBehavior

Implements behaviors that perform actions that only require a single frame to execute. Configure AtomicBehavior with a function argument that takes World as input. For example, the following code enables the scene asset with name objName.

Behavior b = new AtomicBehavior(world, (w) => {
   Transform xform = world.Get(objName.Trim());
   xform.gameObject.SetActive(true);
});
